title: Chemical Apple Pie (No Apple Apple Pie)

Ingredients.1: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (225 degrees C).

Directions.2: Roll out pastry and set aside. Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan.

Directions.3: In a small bowl mix together sugar and cream of tartar. Add mixture to boiling water. Stir, then add crackers, one at a time. Boil for 3 minutes, but do not stir.

Directions.4: Pour cracker mixture into pastry-lined pie pan. Sprinkle crackers with cinnamon and dot with butter or margarine. Cover with top pastry. Seal edges and cut steam vents in top.

Directions.5: Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, until crust is golden brown. May need to cover top pastry partway through baking to prevent overbrowning.
